title: Top 15 Video and Audio Lessons for Your First Week
description: Not sure where to start? Here are the top 15 lessons to help you to start learning Korean. Hand-picked!

description: Preparing for a trip to Korea? Here are the lessons you will need to get the most out of your trip.

description: Don't get caught in an emergency without these language skills!

title: Speaking Perfect Korean at a Restaurant
description: Obliterate the language barrier between you and delicious Korean food.

description: Wondering how to answer the phone in French or get a prepaid phone card? These lessons will help you out.

title: Talking About Yourself
description: It's everybody's favorite topic: themselves! Learn how to talk about yourself in Korean.

title: Korean S.O.S.
description: With this core path, learn words and phrases you need to handle basic situations in Korea.

description: With this core path, learn the words, phrases and grammar you need for a night out!

title: Traveling to Korea
description: With this core path, learn the words, phrases and grammar you need to travel around Korea.

title: Mastering the Korean Alphabet
description: These lessons will help you start reading Korean as fast as possible!

title: Pronunciation
description: Want to sound more like a Korean native? Improve your Korean pronunciation with these lessons!

title: Survival Phrases
description: Don't waste your time! Get the most language in the shortest time with these survival phrases.

title: Absolute Beginner Season 1
description: Learn the basics like introducing yourself, greeting people, and more with these lessons!

title: Absolute Beginner Season 2
description: Learn the basics like how to talk about yourself, asking questions, and more with these lessons! Learn valuable cultural tips too!

title: Culture Class: Essential Korean Vocabulary
description: Let South Korean culture be your guide as you build up essential vocabulary and phrases.

description: Learn all of the Hangul characters and how to write them.

title: Ultimate Korean Pronunciation Guide
description: By focusing on the sounds which don't exist in English, you'll master pronunciation fast!

description: 5 lessons, 28 minutes. Your quick-start guide to the absolute basics of Korean.
